about_the_game: Embark on a strategic journey in MERCS INC, a tactical combat RTS where you Displace, Flank, and Outsmart enemies while advancing on Objectives. Take charge of three characters' vision and targeting, making crucial decisions on when and what to resupply, as well as when and how to reinforce their cover. Earn money per kill to enhance your squad's capabilities. Join us in defining the game's exciting evolution.
detailed_description: Embark on a strategic journey in MERCS INC, a tactical combat RTS where you Displace, Flank, and Outsmart enemies while advancing on Objectives. Earn money per kill to enhance your squad's capabilities. Join us in defining the game's exciting evolution.

short_description: 'Mercs Inc': A dynamic blend of tower defense, RTS, and RPG in a fast-paced, top-down strategy game. Engage in thrilling, small-scale combat for an action-packed adventure!
